summary: stucky / No One Wants Your Opinion
title: stucky / No One Wants Your Opinion
body:
LINK

word count: 5.6k

Wherein Bucky loves to cuddle Steve Rogers, Steve comes out on national television for the sole purpose of spiting conservative politicians, Tony sees things he wishes he hadn’t, and Pepper doesn’t know why she even bothers.

title: stuckony / Second Chance (at happiness)
body:
LINK

word count: 27.2k

Tony knew better than to play with alien toys. He really did. But there was just something so tempting about other-worldly objects. It turned out that he wasn’t the only Tony Stark that felt that way. One explosion later, there’s a brand new Tony in town. But there’s something not quite right about this Tony and how he reacts to the team, the way he flinches away from Bucky or shakes when Steve picks up the shield or won’t turn his back to Clint and Natasha.

It turns out that not every Tony Stark is as lucky as Tony, but damned if Tony, Steve and Bucky aren’t going to fix that.

(or, the one where canon MCU Tony gets thrown into a fanon world and gets ALL THE LOVE from the fanon version of the team)

reblog.comment:
LINK

summary: stuckony / Hide A Heart Of War
title: stuckony / Hide A Heart Of War
body:
LINK

word count: 13.5k

“You’ve got war in your heart boy,” Howard sneers, “don’t ever try and pretend to be anything but what you are.”

Tony feels the familiar burn of a flower mark being etched into his skin but he doesn’t look, doesn’t try and check to see what it is. Instead he keeps his eyes on Howard and his hands cupped around his bleeding mouth and nose.

LINK

summary: friendly reminder that before thor was muffled he had blood on his lips, but not a lot??
body:
friendly reminder that before thor was muffled he had blood on his lips, but not a lot??

but once loki died, and thor crawled towards his body, he’s got blood dripping down his chin.

he literally screamed so hard while loki was dying that he made his mouth bleed.

summary: Petition for Marvel fans to make an MCU day where we marathon movies. Like May The 4th for Star Wars (although traditionally...
body:
Petition for Marvel fans to make an MCU day where we marathon movies. Like May The 4th for Star Wars (although traditionally that’s a Marvel weekend anyway).

I thought of 6/16 in reference to the comics’ universe, or maybe a date in April to get all the movies watched before the next big one in May.

Idk, just seems like nearly TWENTY movies should have their own marathon day.

reblog.comment:

Idk, just seems like nearly TWENTY movies should have their own marathon day.

body:
Marvel (Panini) em setembro

Devido à distribuição das revistas Panini da Marvel e Mauricio de Sousa prevista para julho só ter ocorrido em agosto, as revistas inicialmente previstas para agosto foram distribuídas no início de setembro nos pontos de venda de periódicos nacionais. Para cada um dos seis números brasileiros, damos indicações se o material já se encontra publicado em Portugal pela Goody ou não, de modo a…

summary:
Peter P : Mr.Barnes ,have you seen my dad? 
Bucky : who? 
Peter P : My dad? Tony Stark? 
Bucky : Tony Stark who? 
Peter P : Iron...
body:
Peter P : Mr.Barnes ,have you seen my dad?

Bucky : who?

Peter P : My dad? Tony Stark?

Bucky : Tony Stark who?

Peter P : Iron Man?

Bucky : Iron Man who?

Peter P : Son of Howard Stark?

Bucky : Again!!! Who??

Peter P : The guy who’s fucking the love of your life!!??

Bucky : …

summary:
Okay, but listen.
You know that if everyone survives in Avengers 4 and Tony has a child, you know that Peter will love it....
body:
Okay, but listen.

You know that if everyone survives in Avengers 4 and Tony has a child, you know that Peter will love it.

He’ll also sing “Baby Shark” to the baby, Tony, and Pepper (replacing Shark with Stark instead). Tony would ground him.

reblog.comment:
Okay, but listen.

You know that if everyone survives in Avengers 4 and Tony has a child, you know that Peter will love it.

He’ll also sing “Baby Shark” to the baby, Tony, and Pepper (replacing Shark with Stark instead). Tony would ground him.

summary: Titres Marvel Comics sortis le 5 septembre 2018
title: Titres Marvel Comics sortis le 5 septembre 2018
body:
C'est la rentrée et on reprend notre rythme, avec la critique des titres Marvel Comics de la semaine dernière.

Chaque semaine, nous vous proposons des critiques rapides des séries publiées par Marvel Comics que nous suivons régulièrement. Cette semaine, on parle de Avengers, Captain America, Cosmic Ghost Rider, Death of the Inhumans, Immortal Hulk et Spider-Man/Deadpool.

(more…)
